name: Halloween Bean Café
description:
Make coffee for various kooky characters, all dressed up and ready for Halloween!

All you need is a mouse: click and drag ingredients to make customers orders. Just be sure to get it right, otherwise you might go out of business.

There was an entire Tower Defence part of this game that I didn't finish polishing. It is not the finished product.

Also beware of bugs. I'm still pretty new to coding....

This was a submission to the 2021 Autumn Game Jam. 

This is set in Autumn in Northern Hemisphere to fit with the theme of the Jam.

Tried to use the given colour palette.

Art by Andrew - "couldn't find a ruler" Hickin.

Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo
http://www.matthewpablo.com
